message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product. It's worth a lot to me, so I'm asking for $150.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your interest.  I can do $135, but that's my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125.
